column3:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard\f0 Indicates if this contact is blocked for use in CRM functionalities for the specified customer.\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard\f0 By marking this check box after entering an address identity, the corresponding address information will be copied to the new or existing person\f0 .\f0\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard\f0 The ID of the address. If a contact person is to be connected to a single address, a value should be entered in this field. The contact will then also be visible in IFS/Customer Order and the \b\i General Address Info\b0\i0  sub\f0  \f0 tab of Customer/\b\i Address\b0\i0  tab. No value is displayed in this field by default since the contact is regarded as a general customer contact.\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard\f0 Campaign interests of the contact. You can select more than one value for this field. Campaign interests are defined in the \b\i\f0 CRM Basic Data\b0\i0\f0  window.\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard\f0 Contact's ability to take decisions.\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard\f0 The department of the contact that he/she works at this customer.\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard\f0 The manager of the contact in regard to this customer. The manager should be\f0  \f0 another contact of this customer.\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard\f0 The customer address ID of the manager.\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard\f0 The name of the manager.\f0  \f0 This field is automatically filled according to the value displayed \f0 in \f0 the \b Manager\b0  field. \f0\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard\f0 The general default messenger number entered on the Person record. If a contact address has been specified the default value for this number is shown. You can update an existing value in the Person/\b\i\f0 Comm. Method \b0\i0\f0 tab.\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard\f0 The general default pager number entered on the Person\f0  record\f0 . If a contact address has been specified the default value for this address is shown. \f0 You can update an existing value in the IFS/Enterprise,Person/Comm. Method tab.\f0\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard\f0 Personal interests of the contact. You can select more than one value for this field. Personal interests are defined in the \b\i\f0 CRM Basic Data\b0\i0\f0  window.\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard\f0 The role of the contact in regard to this customer. You can select more than one value for this field. Contact Roles are defined in the \b\i\f0 Enterprise/Basic Data/ Contact Roles\b0\i0\f0  window.\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard The persons title, e.g., Mr., Mrs. The use of the title field may vary.\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard\f0 The general default www address entered on the Person record. If a contact address has been specified the default value for this address is shown. You can update an existing value in the IFS/Enterprise,Person/Comm. Method tab.\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard\f0 The identity of the person.\par
}
